name: Horror Space Station Environment (University Work 2022)
description:
This upload is specifically to showcase art that I created whilst at University studying Games Design Art. The walls purposely don't have colliders to make it easy to move and look around.

The concept is that, the government have found an alien monster in space, and what to experiment on it without bring it back to Earth. So they created a small space station for experiments to take place, only... it escapes.
